What is (are) Prevent diabetes problems: Keep your kidneys healthy ?,"Kidney failure, also called end-stage kidney disease or ESRD, means your kidneys no longer work well enough to do their job. You will need treatment to replace the work your kidneys have stopped doing.",NIDDK,Prevent diabet
